EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Book your S1P Travel 8-7-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Planes, Trains, and Automobiles: SpringOne Platform Travel
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> SpringOne Platform is just around the corner and we want you to be prepared. Start planning now and get ready to connect, collaborate, and learn from fellow members of the Spring and cloud-native communities. Book Your Travel by August 30 If you haven't already, check out the travel page <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/attend]]> on the SpringOne Platform website. There you will find information about the Gaylord National Resort, our conference hotel, along with transportation, parking, registration information, and more. Discounted hotel rooms are limited and going quickly, so please use this link <[[https://book.passkey.com/gt/216263797?gtid=4f49412824ec0242e71c6a4155bc3828]]> to book your hotel room today! Stay Connected Join the conversation on Twitter #SpringOne <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/SpringOne]]>, and follow @S1P <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> for news and updates. We look forward to seeing you in September! The SpringOne Platform Team
